name: mern-tts-user
description: A fullstack Mongo/Express/React/Node/GraphQL user app for use with TapTech Systems

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd server && npx nodemon server" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
